statements: DELETE FROM UserInformation WHERE user_id = 100 AND height > 170.5
DELETE FROM UserInformation WHERE weight < 70 OR goal = 'lose weight'
DELETE FROM UserInformation WHERE height < 160.0 AND (weight > 80 OR goal = 'gain muscle')
DELETE FROM UserAchievements WHERE user_id = 123 AND goal_id = 456;
DELETE FROM UserGoals WHERE goal_id IN (SELECT goal_id FROM UserAchievements WHERE user_id = 123);
DELETE FROM UserInformation WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM UserAchievements WHERE goal_id = 456);
DELETE FROM user_address WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE duration_minutes > 60 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND preference = 'color';
DELETE FROM user_goals WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND target < 100;
